info.comment: This article needs serious work. I corrected a few facts, but the article needs much more meat. Added a second external link with an excellent article on the city.

content.*:
[[fr:Chandigarh]]
'''Chandigarh''' is a city in [[India]] that serves as the [[capital]] of two states: [[Punjab, India]] and [[Haryana|Haryana, India]]. However, the city does not belong to either state. Rather, the city is administered by the federal government and hence classified as a [[Union Territory]]. '''Chandigarh''' is also the name this Union Territory.

Chandigarh is a [[planned city]], like [[Gandhinagar]], the capital of [[Gujarat]].

Several buildings in Chandigarh were designed by the Swiss [[architect]] [[Le Corbusier]] in the 1950s.

==External link==
*http://chandigarh.nic.in/
*http://www.pals.org/pec/chandigarh/chandigarh.html
